PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE 
	{ 	?dataset dcterms:identifier ?label }
INSERT
	{ 	?dataset dcterms:identifier ?hash }
WHERE
	{ 	?dataset a dcat:Dataset .
		?dataset dcterms:identifier ?label .
		BIND ( SHA1(CONCAT('infrabel/', ?label)) as ?hash )
	}
